content:
More than 6.6 thousand Russian invaders were eliminated during the week of the Armed Forces. 952 units of weapons and military equipment of the enemy were burned.

About thisreportedCommander of the Land Forces of the Armed Forces of Ukraine Lieutenant General Alexander Pavlyuk.

"In a weekfrom 10 to 17 March 2024the yearUkraine's defense forces destroyed almost6680 personnel of enemy personnel», - he said.

The enemy's equipment also suffered significant losses. Our defenders destroyed:

  • 59 tanks;
  • 147 combat armored vehicles;
  • 168 artillery systems;
  • 2 Rsv;
  • 11 PPO units;
  • 321 units of auto engineering;
  • 51 units of special equipment.

"In addition, our defenders destroyed 3 enemy missiles and 190 UAVs," Oleksandr Pavliuk added.

As reportedArmyinform, in the day, the enemy minus 1160 invaders, 11 tanks and 28 artsystems.
title: In a week, the Defense Forces eliminated more than 6.6 thousand Russians, 59 tanks and 168 artillery systems
description: This was announced by the Commander of the Ground Forces of the Armed Forces of Ukraine, Lieutenant General...
author: Army Inform
